summary: This mod adds an armor looks like Dragon priests.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
This mod adds an armor looks like Dragon priests.

How to use:
Armor and masks are now craftable and enchantable with dragon smithing at any forge.
Ingredients:
Leatherstrips  1
Dragon scale   1
Dragon bone    1

or

Open the console, then please type these codes.
player.additem XX001003 1
player.additem XX001004 1
player.additem XX001005 1

XX is DPArmor.esp\'s load order.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Changelog
=========
-0.2a All items are now craftable and enchantable.
-0.2  Added Female version.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
-1st person model isn\'t correct(using Archmage robe\'s one for the moment.)
-There\'s no specific world/inventory models.
-Some pretty clipping issue for female version.

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to SkyrimNexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to God for creating us all.

Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but don\'t complain to me if it
doesn\'t work or your PC blows up.
author: Backsteppo
